name: HongKongWeather
0:
”Alexa, ask Hong Kong Weather today”
”Alexa, ask Hong Kong Weather for forecast today”
”Alexa, open Hong Kong Weather”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hong kong weather
des:
This skill enables Alexa to tell you the most recent weather forecast for Hong Kong directly from the Hong Kong Observatory, e.g. Alexa, ask Hong Kong Weather for today forecast, will give you temperature, humidity and a summary of the most recent forecast.

Please visit http://www.hko.gov.hk/ for more details of Hong Kong Observatory. Please note the skill is not sponsored or endorsed by Hong Kong Observatory.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
